page.title: 12GAMES
page.content: At school we have a football team in the winter and cricket team in the summer. In football you have to kick a ball between two posts for a goal. The team who scores the most goals wins. The headmaster arranges matches for the teams. Wigmore school holds an annual event called the Wigmore tournament. About twenty four teams play in the Wigmore tournament and they are divided into four groups. The winners of each group play in the semi final and the two winners there play in the final. The winning team is the team that wins the final. In cricket you have to defend the three stumps behind you and hit the ball. If you hit the ball a long way you run up the other end for a run. The team with the most runs wins. We practise different games every Wednesday.
